analysis.description:
INX.constructor (/unique_chucks/2/0xae353daeed8dcc7a9a12027f7e070c0a50b7b6a4.sol#112-128) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(address(this).balance == 0)

INX._decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0xae353daeed8dcc7a9a12027f7e070c0a50b7b6a4.sol#100-101)
INX._name should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0xae353daeed8dcc7a9a12027f7e070c0a50b7b6a4.sol#97-99)
INX._symbol should be constant (/unique_chucks/2/0xae353daeed8dcc7a9a12027f7e070c0a50b7b6a4.sol#99-100)
